name: Space Endeavor
description:
Space Endeavor is an Action Shooter Game where you can shoot Enemies with many different types of Guns. It isn't an easy game though, there are many bosses you must defeat in order to unlock new guns, and eventually, beat the game!

There are 3 bosses that you can defeat to unlock new guns.
There are 4 guns that you can use to defeat enemies.

Controls:
WASD to move
Left mouse button to shoot
Shift to roll

GUNS:

LASER PISTOL:

-Shoots 1 bullet
-Deals 3 damage
-Found in the lobby

LASER AR:

-Shoots consecutive bullets
-Deals 5 damage
-Dropped by the first boss

Star Cannon:

-Shoots consecutive stars
-Shoots homing stars
-Deals 15 Damage
-Dropped by the second boss

OctoShot:

-Shoots ink in 8 directions
-Shoots homing ink
-Deals 25 Damage
-Dropped by the third boss
